answers.answer: I'd mention it to your doctor at your next apt and if your apt is far away I'd call and ask, could be signs of toxemia but not always
That's how its been for me exactly. My Dr ended up putting me on bed rest at 36 weeks because of it. Said its 1 of 3 signs of preeclampsia

question: I'm 34weeks and have been noticing some swelling in my hands and feet, of course this is normal but I see my hands and feet more swollen on my right side then my left. I feel like I should  be concerned, should I go to l&,d?
title: Help do I need to go to L&D?
